FuncDef: The display dhcpv6 relay configuration command displays global configurations of a DHCPv6 relay agent.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check global configurations of a DHCPv6 relay agent, including the DUID of the relay agent and whether the PD route advertisement function is enabled, run the display dhcpv6 relay configuration command. The DUID of the relay agent is configured using the dhcpv6 duid command. The PD route advertisement function is enabled using the dhcpv6 export pd-route command.
